resources.string: Its time!! Drink some water and update me!!
Please give us some information to customize the experience for you!!
Enter your custom intake target in ml
Your daily work out time in minutes/day
Let us keep you hydrated and healthy!!
Your body uses water in all its cells, organs, and tissues to help regulate its temperature and maintain other bodily functions. It\'s 60% of your body weight.
Water helps maximize physical performance!! Lack of water can lead you to dehydration.
Water aids in digestion, brain function and protects you from illness .
